title: Resource-constrained Fairness
details: S Goethals, E Delaney, B Mittelstadt, C Russell - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.01290, 2024
abstract: Access to resources strongly constrains the decisions we make. While we might wish to offer every student a scholarship, or schedule every patient for follow-up meetings with a specialist, limited resources mean that this is not possible. Existing tools for fair …
